1.content:
Jake: http://abload.de/img/imagedfi4n.jpg

Jake's alarm clock blared, it was 7:30am.

By far the earliest he has been awake all summer. The vacation was now a little over half way through, Jake had been living well. A long break from basket ball, no working out and eating whatever, whenever he had pleased.

Jake was having the summer of his life, and it was beginning to show, he had put on a "little" weight. He had no idea how much, but he definitely noticed it was there, his previously flat stomach was soft and rounded out, hanging over his waistbands and jiggling slightly when he walked.

Jake grunted as he rolled onto his side to shut off his alarm clock. "Fuck" he thought as he raised his arms up over his head, "this is way too early."

He stared up at the ceiling and put his hand on his belly, he rubbed it and gave it a slight jiggle.

"But I guess I'mma have to get up if I want to do something about this" he groaned to himself.

He rolled onto his side again and out of the bed, he hit the ground with a louder thud than a few months ago.

He was wearing nothing but a pair of loose, light blue boxer shorts. His stomach hung over the waistband and wobbled slightly with each step he took, his arms and legs were still relatively toned in comparison.
1.title: Summer Gain

11.content:
Jake decided a good, full breakfast was in order if he was going to be working out.

He went down the stairs of his family's large Calabasas home, still dressed in nothing but his boxer shorts, it was a hot summer morning.

"Mom? Dad?" Jake yelled, "Rosa?" (Rosa was the housekeeper).

"Sweet, I have the place to myself." said Jake.

He went into the kitchen, and opened the fridge doors.

6 Eggs, 8 strips of bacon, 5 sausages, and a big stack of pancakes with butter and syrup.

Jake sat down at a stool by the bench, as he sat down his stomach folded over and sat out on his lap slightly, he poured a large glass of chocolate milk and dug into his breakfast.

Within ten minutes it was all gone, he sat back in his stool and gave his full belly a pat, he sat for another 10 minutes to let it all digest before sliding his butt off the stool, still with his hand on his belly before slowly walking up the stairs to his bedroom.
11.title: Breakfast

111.content:
He opened his dresser draws and grabbed a pair of shorts. he pulled them up over his legs and up to his waist, they were tighter than he remembered, the elasticated waistband was stretched to its limits and when he bent over they were very constricting and clinged to his butt.

"Hmmm", he thought to himself, "Rosa must have shrunk them in the wash, I'll grab another pair, I don't want to be constricted at the gym."

He grabbed a pair of basketball shorts(a larger pair this time) and pulled them up, they weren't as tight as the first pair, but still a little snug and when he bent over they were tight around his well rounded butt as his slight, but growing love handles hung over.

He then grabbed a loose (or what used to be loose) white singlet top and pulled it over his head, and while it had "shrunk as much as the shorts, it was certainly a little more snug than he remembered.

It was still relatively loose around his chest, but it now only just covered his midsection and hung over the top of his waistband.

When he turned to the side to look in the mirror, his soft, rounded middle was clearly visible, he took a deep breath in and sucked in his stomach.

"It's mostly muscle," he thought to himself, before slowly letting his belly out again as it pressed against his singlet top fabric.

There was a slight tear as his stomach exhaled all the way out. Jake looked down and the stitching on the left side of his singlet had split and there was a slight hole.

"No one'll see, I have no idea what Rosa did to these clothes though." he shrugged it off as he made his way down the stairs and out the front door to his truck.

When Jake arrives at the Gym he decides to…
111.title: Getting Dressed

1111.content:
When Jake reached the gym he decided that he should weigh himself before he worked out.

The last time he had weighed himself was the last time he was at the gym, well before the summer had started. He had been 150 lbs when he last weighed in.

He looked around to make sure no one was looking before stepping on to the scale, it let out a slight groan as he stepped on.

The numbers raced up, passing 150, 160, 170 before halting at 176 lbs.

"176 pounds?" Jake asked himself.
"26 pounds since the beginning of summer, I'm gonna have to work harder than I thought." he groaned placing his hand on his stomach.

He looked up at the clock, 10:00am. "I don't think I have the energy for this now, it's been a while since breakfast." he thought.

"I'll need my energy, a little mid morning snack is in order I think, can't work hard on an empty stomach." he smiled to himself.

He stepped off the scale and it groaned a little again, before turning around and leaving the gym and hopping in his truck to find a 'little' mid morning snack.

He stopped at
1111.title: Weigh Himself

11111.content:
He pulled up outside an IHOP restaurant and walked inside.

He saw that they were serving a special brunch challenge offer, finish off their 15 egg omelette with bacon and sausage and you eat free and get unlimited pancakes. He looked down at his belly and gave it a slight pat. "Easy." he thought to himself with a chuckle.

He approached the front counter with a smirk and said, "One omelette challenge, doused in butter." The cashier laughed and told him that he had 20 minutes to finish the omelette if he wanted it free.

"Easy." he said as he grinned at her." Let's make it 10." he winked.

He went and sat in a booth at the back and waited for his omelette. As he sat down his stomach rolled over the waistband and his stomach filled and pushed against the front of the singlet top, his stomach grumbled.

A waitress bought out his omelette, it was the size of the dinner plate and was extremely thick, it was full of sausage and bacon and covered in butter.

He licked his lips and began eating, after five minutes he was well over halfway through the omelette, but he was beginning to slow.
11111.title: IHOP

choices: Sat on the Couch and Watched TV
111111.content:
There was about quarter of the omelette left and he had 3 minutes to go, he slid back in the booth and lifted up his singlet top, his belly rolled out and he started rubbing and massaging it, the cashier was watching him from behind her till, her eyes were placed firmly on his belly as he breathed in and out heavily.

He began eating again and within 2 minutes it was all gone. "And with a minute to spare." he smirked.

All of a sudden the cashier appeared beside him. " Very impressive." she smiled, eyeing his belly which was still hanging out. She placed a large stack of pancakes in front of him.

"What's this?" he said with a grunt as he sat up in the booth.

"Your pancakes, you finished the omelette, so you get free pancakes, remember? Don't tell me you're full already." she cooed with a wink.

"Of course not." he grinned and started to stuff his face with the pancakes.

He pulled himself out of the booth with a grunt and a groan, his belly was full to the max and it showed as he waddled towards the exit with his hand placed on top of his belly.

The cashier approached him again and shook his hand with a wink, " Again, very impressive." she said. "My names Mel, by the way." as she slipped something into his hand before waking back to her till.

Jake exited the restaurant and looked what was in his hand, it was her phone number with an xxx at the end.

"Jeez." he thought. "I knew I was good, but I didn't realise I was that good." He hoped in to his truck, bloated to the max and drove home, deciding that he would go to the gym later after he had properly digested his meal.

He got home and..
111111.title: He Finished It

choices: Jake wakes up and decides to call Mel...
Jake wakes up and decides to go to the Gym...
1111111.content:
Eating all those pancakes had really tired Jake out, and by the time he got home, he felt exhausted. He parked his truck and walked inside the house, still feeling incredibly bloated from his omlette and pancake feast at the IHOP. He let out a small burp as he closed the front door behind him and climbed the stairs, absent mindedly rubbing his overstuffed belly.

"Man...I am stuffed," Jake groaned as he walked into his room.

He looked at the time and saw it was still early. He knew he should probably make his way to the gym and start a new workout routine, but right now he just wanted to have a rest and let some of this food digest. He crossed the room and looked at his reflection in the mirror, surprised by how much his belly was sticking out. Curiously, he pulled his top off over his head and tossed it aside, revealing his stomach.

"Whoaaaaaa!" Jake laughed as he set eyes upon his bloated belly. "I think I might have overdone it a little..."

Jake poked a finger into his belly and found it was tight as a drum, stuffed full of food. He gave it a gentle rub while he admired his handiwork, a little shocked by just how bloated he looked. When he turned to the side, he looked pregnant! But Jake just laughed and gave his belly a satisfied pat. He would have to do something about this at the gym before he started putting on weight.

He gave a loud yawn and stretched his arms above his head. That meal had really taken it out of him, and he suddenly felt like lying down. He walked to his bed and collapsed onto his back, massaging the sides of his expanded belly as he began to drift off to sleep. He smirked as he looked down at his bulging stomach, which blocked the view of his feet. "Gotta cut down, looks like I've swallowed a balloon...heh."

Soon enough, Jake's food exhaustion had sent him to sleep once again. He lay on his back, his hands resting on his bloated stomach, his belly rising and falling as he slept.
1111111.title: Sleepy

choices: Go find some excuse to talk to the cute boy
Go home and call that waitress girl
11111112.content:
"This is getting to be too much..." Jake thought as he got up. "I'd better hit the gym." Jake slipped on some running shorts and a t-shirt, both of which clung a bit to his bloated body. He grabbed a light snack before running out the door, leaving him feeling a bit unsatisfied.

Passing a McDonalds on the way to the gym, his stomach growled. "NO." He told himself. This was his day to get back in shape. When he arrived at the gym he was relieved that there weren't many people there. Jake hated the days when the gym was crowded. It made him feel self-conscious around all those other guys who could bench press him with a pinky, and today would be worse with his new belly.

He climbed on a treadmill and started jogging to warm up. He noticed that his belly jiggled every time his feet hit the ground and smirked. "That's why I'm here, after all" he thought.

Out of the corner of his eye Jake saw one of the few guys there. He was about Jake's hight and age if he had to guess, had blond hair and looked pretty toned. He was lifting some weights, accentuating his sculpted biceps. Jake noticed this boy occasionally throwing glances at his. Jake looked over and the boy turned away.

Jake couldn't tell if his face was red fromthe workout or something else. Jake decided to...

111111121.title: Go find some excuse to talk to the cute boy

choices: "Nah, I can't today, but lets do this again sometime!"
1111111212.content:
Jake and Howard walk down the street to a nearby pizza place. "You know, I always found it funny that there was a pizza place so close to the gym." Jake said.

"Yeah, but I'm not complaining!" Said Howard. "Pizza's the best and I've got to get some fuel for these babies somewhere." He flexes one of his arms jokingly.

"Dude, stop showing off! You're gonna make me feel bad." Jake said, laughing and trying not to stare at Howard's bicep too much. It was a pretty nice arm... both of his arms were nice, and now that they were walking together Jake could tell Howard had a fantastic butt too!

"Nah, you don't have to feel bad. Like I said, a little extra looks good on you..." As Howard says this the two walk through the doors of the pizzeria. "Speaking of, you grab us a seat and I'll get the grub." Jake complied, grabbing a booth in the corner.

Jake sat down, poking at his belly. Did it really look good on him? He'd never really thought that anything fat could be good. I mean, that IS what he was told growing up. Muscle looks good, right? It looks good on Howard. Jake looked over at Howard and imagined him with a belly on top of all that muscle. "Oh god..." Jake mumbled. The thought of it was actually... kind of hot! Jake shook his head as Howard came over carrying two large pizzas, setting them down on the table. "Hold on," Jake said. "You got us that much?"

"Sure! I can pack away a good amount." Howard said, patting his flat stomach. "And I'll admit I'm curious to see how much you can put away." And with that the two boys started eating the first pizza. Over conversation Jake learned that the two boys had a lot in common. Howard was in the same grade as him and they didn't live too far from each other. They liked watching the same types of tv shows and sports and movies and stuff like that. Howard told Jake that he had recently gone through a breakup. When Jake asked why Howard just said they had "conflicting interests." Jake noted that Howard never said "he" or "she" when referring to his ex.

Howard leaned back and let out a belch. "Damn, I love stuffing myself after a good workout. Don't you?" Jake looked down and noticed almost all the pizza was gone!

"Huh, time flies. I thought we still had a whole pizza left!" He said.

"Nah, I had 8 slices and you had 10. You think you can finish the other 6?" Jake pondered the question. He could probably finish a few more... but Howard looked so good with his stomach all bloated up...

"Eh, I'll try." He said. Jake finished another slice and started another. Unfortunately, his pants were feeling tight. Each bite was starting to take it's tole. By the time that slice was down Jake's pants felt way too tight.

"What's the matter? Can't you do it?" Howard said, a disappointing look on his face.

"Nah, dude, my pants are too tight..."

"So just unbutton them. I don't care." Jake was a little surprised and he felt his cheeks heat up. "Come oooooon! You can do it!" Howard encouraged. Jake mindlessly fumbled with his pants, unbuttoning them and freeing his belly. With Howard cheering him on, Jake felt obligated and inspired to devour the remaining four slices. He leaned back and sighed, rubbing his belly.

"Ugh... today was supposed to be my fitness day..." He lamented. Howard scooted next to him and put a hand on Jake's belly, rubbing it in small circles.

"I don't think it's that big of a deal..." He said soothingly. "I mean, if you're happy then you're happy, and you look pretty happy with 15 slices of pizza in your gut..."

Jake relaxed under Howard's touch. "Yeah... it's pretty good..."

"Your gut looks pretty happy too, haha!" He chuckled softly, patting Jake's belly. Jake burped, causing them both to giggle.

"It is pretty happy... My belly likes food way too much..." Jake sighed, suddenly embarrassed to have made a pig of himself in front of this cute guy,

"You know," Howard continued, "We should hang out some time... If that's cool with you. Maybe we could head back to my place or something..."

Jake responded...

11111112121.title: "Sure, why not?"

111111121212.content:
Howard scooped Jake up in his arms and carried him bridal style over to the living room and laid him down on a plush couch. He the hurried off and returned with an ice pack that he put on Jake's head. Jake laid down, one hand clutching the ice pack and the other on his belly. He moaned uncomfortably. Howard pulled a chair up next to him. He watched over Jake as he came to. "Hey, how're you doing?" Howard said softly. "Sorry about that, I guess I got carried away."

Jake grunted as he turned his head towards Howard. "I don't feel so... good..." He then felt something coming up and made a face. Howard grabbed a trash can and held it up to Jake, ready for what was coming. Jake leaned over and let out an immense burp, resembling that of a dragon! He the propped himself up with his arms, his chubby belly bunching up. "Ok, I'm better now!" He said, laughing and relieved that the worse was over.

"That was it?" Howard said, concerned. He placed the trash can down nearby and rested his hand lightly on Jake's stomach. "You sure you aren't gonna be sick?"

"No, I guess it was just the soda. Besides, I'm a big boy! I can handle a punch," Jake said, lightly punching Howard on the shoulder. He placed his hand on Howard's which rested on his belly. "Thanks, by the way. For, you know, taking care of me... and stuff." Jake said, fumbling with his words a little. He lightly squeezed Howard's hand and Howard in return held Jake's hand. Jake's cheeks tinted a shade of pink and he looked away. "Sorry... for that, and, uh, you know..."

Howard cut him off, bringing a hand up to hold Jake's chin. "Hey, it's no problem..." Their eyes met and Jake's apologetic look turned into a quivering nervous smile. Their faces grew a little closer and Howard leaned in...
111111121212.title: Lays jake on the sofa

1111111212121.content:
The two boys' lips gently caressed each other in a soft kiss. Howard pulled Jake closer and as their eyes fluttered shut they kissed again, tenderly yet without doubt. A rosy hue rose to their cheeks. The hands they the boys held became intertwined by the fingers. And there they stayed, face to face, lips to lips, as if time had come to a stop. It could have been years until their lips parted. Jake's smile was ear to ear.

"You..." He said, not knowing the words for how he felt.

"I... yeah... I told you I think you're cute," Howard grinned. They kissed.

"You... too... I guess, I mean, you are. You really are!" Jake fumbled with his words, but their eyes met again and once more they kissed.

"Everything about you is adorable... Everything..." Howard took his hand released it from Jake's, running it along the boy's chest down to the belly. If time were moving at all it was slow enough for Howard to spend lifetimes petting the rounded stomach. Howard rested his hand on Jake's side and felt the pressure of Jake's pudge pressing into him with every deep breath. Jake sighed at the feeling of Howard's hand on his still swollen gut.

"Hehe... I guess I'll be even cuter once I get rid of that, huh?" He laughed, referring to his belly.

"I said everything." Howard responded with a soft smile. Jake looked up at him from his trance of relaxation. "I think your belly is... really cute. I like it... a lot." Now was Howard's turn to blush and avert his eyes. He tensed up as if expecting a blow.

"Ah... so that explains the pizza, huh?"

"Yeah... sorry about that."

"No problem, man. You can feed me that much any time!" Jake giggled. Howard let out a sigh of relief.

"I'd like that." Howard climbed onto the couch to embrace Jake and they kissed again, letting warmth and affection bloom between them. There they stayed for hours until it was finally time for Jake to head home.

11111121212.content:
Honestly Jake had never felt more pitiful. He was stuffed to the brim, already too fat to play on the basketball team he was the star of last year, and now he was hopping from restaurant to restaurant binging on fast food. Fortunately the road he was on had several fast food places lined up in a row. He stopped at Burger King and got 2 whoppers and a soda, went to his car where nobody could see and downed those and half an hour later drove to Wendy's and got a few things there. After that was Arby's and then a Friendly's. As Jake binged hot tears rolled down his face. He was such a fat ass, he deserved for his gut to feel like it was going to burst. If his belly stopped hurting he would pound down another burger, a fitting punishment in his mind for letting himself become so disgusting. Once it was late at night Jake drove home and staggered to the bathroom, clutching his gut and groaning.

Whimpering, Jake looked into the mirror. He was definitely a fat ass now, the kind he used to make fun of with his friends when they weren't looking. He had a full double chin, a plush poofy chest and a belly that stuck out and hung over his waistband. His fat poured over the sides of his shorts into juicy love handles. His ass had grown too, jiggling when he jogged. Jake choked back his tears. He smacked his gut angrily and it jiggled a little, although it would have jiggled more if he weren't grossly full. The movement in his gut stirred his insides, letting out a belch. Despite his sadness Jake couldn't help but laugh at his burp. He then let out an even larger, louder belch. Thank goodness his parents weren't home.

Then Jake decided to think of the positives. Sure, he wasn't on the basketball team anymore, but the team always took up so much time! Now he could spend more time with his friends who weren't on the team. And yeah he might get made fun of for turning into a fatty but he was always told that anyone who makes fun of him isn't worth his time. And hey, no more worrying about keeping up his image! If he wanted to gorge in public, it's practically the civic duty of the fat kid to do that. Jake was always invited to that burger place his heftier friends go to but turned them down because he had to keep himself slim. He was always the class clown too and fat kids are always funnier. Jake sniffled a little and calmed down. Maybe this wouldn't be so bad....
11111121212.title: Pathetic Binging

choices: At Big Boy's, Jake shows off his eating prowess...
At Big Boy's, Jake tries to hold back...
111111212121.content:
The next day at school, as the last class of the day wrapped up, Jake squeezed his plump butt out of his seat and bounded down the hall as fast as his larger frame would allow towards the vending machines where his friends tended to meet. About half way he found himself well out of breath. He leaned against a set of lockers and grabbed his sides. A group of jocks walked by on their way out, and Jake was pretty sure they were laughing at him. He shrugged it off and gave his belly a pat of appreciation. "It's not that bad..." Jake thought to himself. "Maybe if they tried being fat they wouldn't mind it either."

All day Jake had been finding new ways to appreciate his fat. For one, the extra padding gave him something to play with when he was bored. Sometimes during boring lectures he found himself playing with a roll of fat between his fingers, pinching and prodding at the softness. Also, he had a lot more room in his gut during lunch, which was awesome since today was pizza day! He was able to down twice as much as he could have before, and the more pizza the better in his opinion! The feeling of a stuffed belly was nice too.

After a minute Jake regained his breath and walked, more slowly this time, to his destination where his friends were chatting. "Hey guys!" He called out as they looked over to him with quizzical faces.

The three friends there were Mitch, a tall, lanky blonde boy with angular features, Keith, a chubby (although now slightly smaller than Jake) black boy a few inches shorter than Jake, and Peter, a boy average in height and build with glasses and black hair.

"Yo Jake, shouldn't you be at basketball practice?" Peter asked.

"No, I didn't make the team this year..." Jake scratched the back of his head, still embarrassed to say it.

"I'll say. No more calling me porker, huh?" Keith poked at Jake's belly, which his shirt only barely covered.

"Yeah, when are you gonna his the gym, man? You've really put on a few..." Mitch said.

"Pfft, who cares?" Jake rolled his eyes. "Staying in shape was too much work anyways. And it's not like I can't throw a punch anymore!" He said, punching Keith's shoulder for emphasis.

"That does NOT sound like the Jake we know. What made you change your mind?" Keith said, rubbing his shoulder.

"I dunno, maybe I felt sorry for you, tubbs?" Jake joked. "But really, I just stopped caring I guess. Call it confidence!" He put his hands on his sides and puffed out his chest, causing the bottom of his belly to show.

"Oh, well... that's good?" Peter said. "Well we were about to head over to Big Boy's. You wanna join us now that you have the time?"

"And now that you have the figure to match." Keith added in. Big Boy's was the local burger joint the guys normally hung out at. Jake had never been there himself, but he heard the food was good enough.

"Sure! I'm totally hungry anyways!" Jake grinned. Mitch mumbled something under his breath to Peter, who smirked.
111111212121.title: Embracing the chub

1112.content: He uses the nearest open workout machine discouraged looking at all the other slimmer people around him. It had been about 3 hours since he first arrived he was really eager to lose this weight, Them he noticed something wrong his clothes seemed to be tighter than they were when he first came. It especially felt tighter in his crotch ,when he looked down he was horrified his cock and balls were swelling. It looked like someone shoved a volley ball down his pants. Good thing no one was around to see his massive package. But that wasn't the only thing his stomach and man boobs began to grow bigger as well. He rushed to his car sitting there baffled for at least five minutes wondering what to do.
1112.title: Workout
